languages.text: {n}Окровавленное лицо искажает брезгливая гримаса.{/n} "Скучнее предложения я и представить не мог. На что мне сдалась эта святоша Инцендия? Предсказуемая, как пробка от бутыли с даммасcином. То ли дело ксеносы — изворотливые, хищные, безжалостные... Вот это я понимаю противники!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Окровавленное лицо искажает брезгливая гримаса.{/n} "Скучнее предложения я и представить не мог. На что мне сдалась эта святоша Инцендия? Предсказуемая, как пробка от бутыли с даммасcином. То ли дело ксеносы — изворотливые, хищные, безжалостные... Вот это я понимаю противники!"

languages.text: {n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"
languages.original_text: {n}Окровавленное лицо искажает брезгливая гримаса.{/n} "Скучнее предложения я и представить не мог. На что мне сдалась эта святоша Инцендия? Предсказуемая, как пробка от бутыли с даммасcином. То ли дело ксеносы — изворотливые, хищные, безжалостные... Вот это я понимаю противники!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A disgusted grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposal more boring than this one. Why would I care about this holier-than-thou Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassino. Now the xenos — Slippery, predatory, merciless... There are real enemies!"

{n}A disgusted grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposal more boring than this one. Why would I care about this holier-than-thou Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassino. Now the xenos — Slippery, predatory, merciless... There are real enemies!"

{n}A disgusted grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposal more boring than this one. Why would I care about this holier-than-thou Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassino. Now the xenos — Slippery, predatory, merciless... There are real enemies!"

{n}A disgusted grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposal more boring than this one. Why would I care about this holier-than-thou Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassino. Now the xenos — Slippery, predatory, merciless... There are real enemies!"

{n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"

{n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"

languages.text: {n}Su cara salpicada de sangre se tuerce en una mueca de desprecio.{/n} «No se me ocurre propuesta más aburrida. ¿Por qué iba a importarme esa santurrona mojigata de Incendia? Es más predecible que el tapón de una botella de damasino. Los xenos, por otra parte, son depredadores escurridizos y despiadados... ¡eso sí que es un enemigo de verdad!».
languages.original_text: {n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Su cara salpicada de sangre se tuerce en una mueca de disgusto.{/n} «No se me ocurre propuesta más aburrida que esa. ¿Por qué iba a importarme esa santurrona de Incendia? Es más predecible que el tapón de una botella de damasino. Los xenos, por otra parte, son depredadores escurridizos y despiadados... ¡eso sí que es un enemigo de verdad!».

languages.text: {n}他血迹斑斑的脸露出鄙夷的神色。{/n}“我想不出比这更无聊的提议了。我干嘛要在乎那个道貌岸然的因森蒂娅？她就像达马西诺酒的瓶塞一样，一眼就看透了。可那些异形就不一样了，他们狡猾、凶残、无情……这才是真正的对手！”
languages.original_text: {n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他血迹斑斑的脸露出厌恶的神情。{/n}“我想不出比这更无聊的提议了。我干嘛要在乎那个道貌岸然的因森蒂娅？她就像达马西诺酒的瓶塞一样，一眼就看透了。至于异形，他们狡猾、凶残、无情……这才是真正的敌人！”

languages.text: {n}Une grimace condescendante tord son visage maculé de sang.{/n} « Difficile de faire plus barbante, comme proposition... Je me contrefiche de cette moralisatrice d'Incendia, elle est aussi prévisible que le bouchon d'une bouteille de dammassine. Les xénos, en revanche, sont sournois, meurtriers et impitoyables... Ils font des adversaires dignes de ce nom ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une grimace de dégoût tord son visage maculé de sang.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas plus barbant, comme proposition ? Je me contrefiche de cette moralisatrice d'Incendia, elle est aussi prévisible que le bouchon d'une bouteille de dammassino. Les xénos, en revanche, sont sournois, meurtriers et sans merci... Ce sont eux, les véritables ennemis ! »

languages.text: {n}血に染まった顔を、侮蔑的な苦笑いで歪めた。{/n}「これほどつまらない提案はないな。聖人ぶったインセンディア風情に、なぜ俺が関心を持たなければならない？あいつはダンマッシーノの瓶の栓のように予測可能だ。今、異種族たちには…移り気で、無慈悲な、捕食者たる…真の敵がいるのさ！」
languages.original_text: {n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"

traits.locale_text: {n}血に染まった顔を、侮蔑的な苦笑いで歪めた。{/n}「これほどつまらない提案はないな。聖人ぶったインセンディア風情に、なぜ俺が関心を持たなければならない？あいつはダンマッシーノの瓶の栓のように予測可能だ。今、異種族たちには…移り気で、無慈悲な、捕食者たる…真の敵がいるのさ！」

languages.text: {n}Eine Grimasse der Verachtung verzerrt sein blutverschmiertes Gesicht.{/n} "Ich könnte mir keinen langweiligeren Vorschlag vorstellen. Warum sollte mich diese frömmelnde Incendia scheren? Sie ist so vorhersehbar wie der Stopfen in einer Flasche Dammassin. Die Xenos dagegen ... Sie sind schlüpfrig, räuberisch, gnadenlos ... Das nenne ich mal einen wahren Gegner!"
languages.original_text: {n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine angewiderte Grimasse verzerrt sein blutverschmiertes Gesicht.{/n} "Ich könnte mir keinen langweiligeren Vorschlag vorstellen. Warum sollte mich diese frömmelnde Incendia interessieren? Sie ist so vorhersehbar wie der Stopfen in einer Flasche Dammassino. Die Xenos dagegen ... Schlüpfrig, räuberisch, gnadenlos ... Das sind wahre Feinde!"

languages.text: {n}Kana bulanmış yüzü, horgörüyle buruşuyor.{/n} "Bundan daha sıkıcı bir teklif düşünemiyorum. Dinden başka bir şey bilmeyen ukala İncendia neden umurumda olsun? Damason şişesindeki tıpa kadar öngörülebilir birisi o. Zenolara gelirsek... Onlar hilekâr, yırtıcı ve merhametsizler... Gerçek birer rakipler!"
languages.original_text: {n}A contemptuous grimace distorts his blood-smeared face.{/n} "I could not imagine a proposition more boring. Why would I care about that pious prig Incendia? She's as predictable as the stopper from a bottle of dammassine. Now, the xenos — they are slippery, predatory, merciless... That's what I call a real opponent!"
